page.title: 11WOOLSTON-a farming village.
page.content: Woolston has a population of about 80 people.Nine families are engaged in farming.Hill Ash Farm,together with its farm office,is located here and also the Vale of Camelot Growers,the horticultural holding.Cows are 'hunted' in ,up the village street, twice a day for milking. Some of the newer bungalows and most of the older,smaller cottages in the village are occupied by farm workers while the larger,more substantial properties have been renovated or converted to provide homes for professional people.These include several 17th.century buildings still thatched. More planting of trees,retention of ponds and maintenance of hedgerows is thought to benefit the area.Generally considered by all to be a pleasent place to lead an unhurried life.
